notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: J.R. and E.R. realized the experimental work; J.R. and G.G. collected the plant; J.R., G.V. and G.G. realized the experimental design and interpreted experimental data; S.T. and A.M.P. realized antifungal experiments; C.B. advised on quantitative and enantioselective analysis of the essential oil. All of the authors contributed to writing the article.
